turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like I'd like to place an order for pick-up at Peet's Coffee, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm not sure how the sizes go, but I'd like a grande iced espresso with honey and whipped cream. And can I also have coconut milk in that, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want an iced espresso with whipped cream and coconut milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right. And can I also have whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size will that be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which peet's coffee store are you picking it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sorry I don't have the address right here, one second.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. That's going to be the one in Tustin, California.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I think it's on, let's see, Newport Avenue, 12932.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so the peet's coffe at newport avenue, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: just to confirm: i have a medium iced espresso, with whipped cream and coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so medium iced espresso, with whipped cream, coconut milk and honey, is this correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect. your coffee will be ready to be picked up at peet's coffee at Newport ave in 15 minutes.
